TOOLTIP.START: Click and drag to draw a circle.
Click on the map to place a marker.
Click to start drawing a shape.
TOOLTIP.END: Click the first point to close the polygon.
Click the last point to finish the line.

TOOLTIP.START: Click and drag to draw a rectangle.
Click on the map to place a circle marker.

TOOLTIP.TEXT: Drag handles or shapes to edit.
Click a shape to remove it.

adv_search.title: Advanced Search
adv_search.event_type_opt_3: Events with at least one damage

mechanisms_of_flooding.LBL_MEC_FLOOD_COD_A21_EXT: Inondazione di aree per superamento della capacità di contenimento dell'alveo o per superamento del livello delle aree a esso adiacenti
mechanisms_of_flooding.LBL_MEC_FLOOD_COD_A22_EXT: Inondazione di aree dovuta a sormonto delle opere di difesa dalle alluvioni
mechanisms_of_flooding.LBL_MEC_FLOOD_COD_A23_EXT: Inondazione di aree dovuta a rottura delle opere/infrastrutture di difesa naturali o artificiali (inclusi, ad es., rotture arginali, mancato funzionamento di impianti di pompaggio o paratoie)
mechanisms_of_flooding.LBL_MEC_FLOOD_COD_A24_EXT: Inondazione di aree dovuta a ostruzioni/restringimenti naturali o artificiali (inclusi, ad es., insufficienza del reticolo fognario, ostruzione tra le pile dei ponti, luci insufficienti dei ponti, mancato contenimento delle acque in canali sotterranei/tombature, ostruzioni dell'alveo dovute blocchi di ghiaccio o a frane)
mechanisms_of_flooding.LBL_MEC_FLOOD_COD_A25_EXT: Inondazione di aree dovuta ad altri meccanismi, quali, ad es., il vento
mechanisms_of_flooding.LBL_MEC_FLOOD_COD_A26_EXT: Nessun dato disponibile sui meccanismi dell'inondazione

source_of_flooding.LBL_SRC_FLOOD_COD_A11_EXT: Alluvione dovuta all'esondazione delle acque del reticolo idrografico (fiumi, torrenti, canali di drenaggio, corsi d'acqua effimeri, laghi e alluvioni causate da fusione nivale)
source_of_flooding.LBL_SRC_FLOOD_COD_A12_EXT: Allagamento provocato direttamente dalle acque di pioggia. Include nubifragi, ruscellamento superficiale o ristagno per superamento delle capacità di drenaggio in ambiente rurale, anche a seguito di scioglimento nivale
source_of_flooding.LBL_SRC_FLOOD_COD_A13_EXT: Inondazione per risalita in superficie di acque sotterranee (emersione delle acque di falda)
source_of_flooding.LBL_SRC_FLOOD_COD_A14_EXT: Inondazione marina delle aree costiere (maree, mareggiate): Alluvione dovuta alle acque provenienti dal mare, estuari e laghi costieri, incluse maree e/o mareggiate
source_of_flooding.LBL_SRC_FLOOD_COD_A15_EXT: Inondazione provocata dal malfunzionamento dei sistemi artificiali di drenaggio, canalizzazione, invaso, difesa
source_of_flooding.LBL_SRC_FLOOD_COD_A16_EXT: Inondazione dovute a origini diverse (tra cui tsunami)

characteristics_of_flooding.LBL_CHAR_FLOOD_COD_A31_EXT: Piena che si sviluppa ed evolve rapidamente e caratterizzata da tempo di preavviso limitato o nullo, solitamente associata a precipitazioni intense su un'area relativamente ristretta
characteristics_of_flooding.LBL_CHAR_FLOOD_COD_A32_EXT: Alluvione dovuta al rapido scioglimento delle nevi, eventualmente in combinazione con pioggia o ostruzioni dovute a blocchi di ghiaccio

phenomenon_reference_subjects.LBL_FLOODLOCDATA_1: Spatial localization of the inundated area or the affected section - Phenomenon (FloodLocation)
phenomenon_reference_subjects.LBL_FLOODLOCDATA_9: Type of Potential Consequences - Cultural Heritage

subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_61: Lines for distribution of electric energy
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_123: CONTAMINAZIONE/INQUINAMENTO - AREE DESIGNATE PER L'ESTRAZIONE DI ACQUA PER USO POTABILE
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_124: CONTAMINAZIONE/INQUINAMENTO - CORPI IDRICI INTESI A SCOPO RICREATIVO COMPRESE LE ACQUE DI BALNEAZIONE
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_125: CONTAMINAZIONE/INQUINAMENTO PER PRESENZA DI FONTI PUNTUALI O DIFFUSE DI INQUINAMENTO
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_126: CONTAMINAZIONE/INQUINAMENTO PER PRESENZA DI AREE SENSIBILI AI NUTRIENTI COMPRESE LE ZONE VULNERABILI A NORMA DELLE DIRETTIVE NITRATI E REFLUI
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_129: ALTRI IMPATTI SUL SUOLO, SULLA BIODIVERSITÀ, LA FLORA E LA FAUNA
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_130: EDIFICI PRIVATI A USO NON ABITATIVO (non residenziale, ad es., uffici, negozi, magazzini)
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_138: RIMOZIONE DETRITI TRASPORTATI DA ALLUVIONE (da alvei, spiagge, aree inondate…)
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_140: DANNI ALLA SALUTE UMANA-DA INQUINAMENTO O CONTAMINAZIONE
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_141: DANNI ALLA SALUTE UMANA-INTERRUZIONE SERVIZI (fornitura/trattamento acqua, comunicazione, trasporto, energia, gas…)
subcategories_of_damage.LBL_DAM_SUBCAT_143: ALTRE STRUTTURE/SERVIZI DI PUBBLICO INTERESSE - AREE VERDI URBANE

reference.name: URL (es: https://dominio.ex/)
reference.title: Title
reference.author: Author
reference.bookmark_ext: Chapter/Paragraphs or pages of the document
reference.error_subject: At least one of the available Subject must be selected
reference.error_name: The URL field is required and must begin with http or https.

event_details.name: Event name
event_details.flood_origin_ext: Enter the Flood Origin of your choice from the available values
event_details.event_category_ext: Enter the Event Category of your choice from the available values
event_details.duration_ext: Duration of the Event, in terms of days/parts of days
event_details.flooded_area_ext: Extension of the flooded area of the event in km^2
event_details.flooded_section_ext: Length of the stretch of river or coast involved in km
event_details.recurrence_ext: Average number of years: value greater than zero or one of the available values
event_details.return_time_ext: Average time in years: value greater than zero or one of the available values
event_details.error_source: Select at least one flood source.
event_details.error_source_date: Source of flooding not selectable for events with date after 12/22/2011
event_details.error_source_selectable: Source of flooding not selectable for events with date after 12/22/2011
event_details.error_other_field: The field Other Source is mandatory and must be at least 10 characters long.
event_details.error_uncertainty_field: The field Cause of Uncertainty is mandatory and must be at least 10 characters long.
event_details.error_area_length_empty: A field between the Flooded Area and the Affected Section must be filled in and be a positive number
event_details.error_flooded_area: Flooded area must be a positive decimal number
event_details.error_flood_length: The segment involved must be a positive decimal number
event_details.error_recurrency: A field between Recurrence and Frequency must be filled. If not available select one of the suggested choices.
event_details.error_recurrence: The OCCURRENCY field must be a number greater than zero or one of the available values
event_details.error_frequency: The FREQUENCY field must be a number greater than zero or one of the available values
event_details.error_event_date: The field Start Date is mandatory (ie: dd/mm/yyyy)
event_details.error_event_date_future: The Start Date must be in the past
event_details.error_duration: The duration field must be a number greater than zero or one of the available values
event_details.error_recurrency_negative: The recurrence field must be a number greater than zero or one of the available values
event_details.event_delete_msg: Do you want to delete the event?
event_details.event_ref_delete_msg: Do you want to delete the reference?

pheno_details.pheno_name_ext: Enter the name of the Phenomenon
pheno_details.pheno_description_ext: Descriptive summary of the phenomenon, dynamics with which the flood occurred
pheno_details.error_name: The name of the phenomenon is mandatory and must contain from 3 to 250 characters.
pheno_details.error_other_mechanism: The field Other Mechanism is mandatory and must be at least 10 characters long.
pheno_details.error_uncertain_mechanism: The field Cause of Uncertainty is mandatory and must be at least 10 characters long.
pheno_details.error_other_characteristic: The field Other Characteristic is mandatory. and must be at least 10 characters long.
pheno_details.error_uncertain_characteristic: The field Cause of Uncertainty is mandatory and must be at least 10 characters long.
pheno_details.error_characteristic_A17_A18: Characteristic selectable only if the source of flooding is unavailable or uncertain.
pheno_details.alert_msg: ATTENZIONE: il Meccanismo della Piena {{mechCode}} che stai eliminando risulta associato ad alcuni Danni. La conferma dell'operazione causerà la perdita dell'informazione del Meccanismo di Piena per tali Danni. E' obbligatorio associare un Meccanismo di Piena a ciascun Danno, altrimenti non sarà possibile validare l'Evento. Correggere le schede Danno associate al Fenomeno corrente:
pheno_details.alert_msg_A26: Impossibile selezionare questo meccanismo: ci sono danni legati agli attuali meccanismi, per procedere eliminare i danni del fenomeno.
pheno_details.alert_msg_A26_remove: Impossibile selezionare questo meccanismo: meccanismo A26 - Nessun dato disponibile sui meccanismi dell'inondazione non è disattivabile perché utilizzato nei danni.

pheno_details.pheno_ref_delete_msg: Do you want to delete the reference?
pheno_details.warning_msg_other_mechanism: WARNING! You are about to select a generic feature; we recommend using a specific one.

pheno_details.pheno_delete_location_error: Error while deleting the localization of the phenomenon
pheno_details.pheno_force_saving_msg: The location of the phenomenon is not consistent with the location of the damages. Do you want to force save?

damage_details.damage_date_ext: The date must be between the event date and the duration set if known
damage_details.error_name: The name field is mandatory and must contain from 3 to 250 characters.
damage_details.error_saving_details: Failure to save the damage, no details added.
damage_details.error_delete_details_number: Attention, impossible to delete all the details, the damage must have at least one detail entered.
damage_details.error_location: Localization of the damage is mandatory if the phenomenon is not localized
damage_details.damage_delete_msg: Do you want to delete the damage?
damage_details.damage_detail_delete_msg: Do you want to delete the damage detail?
damage_details.damage_category_delete_msg: Do you want to delete the damage category?

damage_details.damage_delete_location_error: Error while deleting the localization of the damage
damage_details.damage_force_saving_msg: The location of the damage is not consistent with the location of the phenomenon. Do you want to force save?

import_tool.title: FLOODCAT IMPORT TOOL
import_tool.new_zip_msg: Indications on the file format to upload:
import_tool.new_zip_msg1: The system only accepts ZIP files
import_tool.new_zip_msg2: Inside the ZIP file there must be no subfolders but only the files involved
import_tool.new_zip_msg3: The EVENTS file must be in XLSX format and must have the prefix "floodcat_eventi_" in the name (e.g. floodcat_eventi_NOMEDELMIOFILE.xlsx)
import_tool.new_zip_msg4: REFERENCES files can be more than one and must be in the formats permitted by the directive
import_tool.new_zip_msg5: you can insert the necessary SHAPE files into the ZIP file
import_tool.error_file_type: Attention, the uploaded file is not a ZIP file
import_tool.report_no_data: Error loading report for this import
import_tool.report_no_data_msg: Try again later and if the problem persists, report the anomaly.
